title: Police: Hamlet man arrested after shot by 4 year old
content:
A Hamlet man was arrested on four counts Sunday that relate to his 4-year-old daughter shooting him last month.
The Marshall County prosecutor says David Paulson left a loaded, unsecured .40 caliber Smith and Wesson handgun in the backseat of his vehicle with his daughter back on January 31.
Charging documents indicate he intially lied to police claiming to have shot himself and then later admitted it was reckless to leave the gun where his daughter could get it. He bonded out of jail around 6 Sunday night.
